title: Feather Fall
content:
Feather Fall Level 1 Transmutation Spell You and nearby allies gain Immunity to Falling damage. 10 turns 9m Bonus Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Level 1 Transmutation Spell

You and nearby allies gain Immunity to Falling damage.

Feather Fall is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Feather Fall is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Feather Fall Information

Description: You
